name: Hanuman Aarti
title: Aarti Kije Hanuman Lalaki
description: A powerful aarti dedicated to Lord Hanuman, the supreme devotee of Lord Rama known for his strength, courage, and unwavering devotion. This aarti is performed to seek his protection and blessings.
significance: Invokes Lord Hanuman's blessings for strength, courage, protection from evil, and removal of obstacles.

seo.description: Complete Hanuman Aarti with lyrics in Hindi and English, meaning, and significance. Learn the proper way to perform Lord Hanuman aarti.

sections.title: Lord Hanuman Aarti
sections.content: The Hanuman Aarti is a powerful devotional hymn that praises Lord Hanuman, the mighty devotee of Lord Rama who embodies strength, devotion, and selfless service.

sections.title: Historical Significance
sections.content: This aarti has been sung for centuries by devotees seeking Hanuman's protection. It is especially significant on Tuesdays and Saturdays, days sacred to Hanuman.

sections.title: Complete Aarti Lyrics
sections.content: The complete lyrics of Hanuman Aarti in Hindi with English translation.

subsections.title: Hindi Lyrics
subsections.english:
Perform aarti of Hanuman Lalla
Who destroys evil forces of Lord Raghunatha

By whose strength the lotus feet of Lord Rama are pure
Tulsidas's lord's feet are pure

Doha
Victory to Hanuman, victory to the monkey god
Victory to Lakshmana, victory to Gopinatha

Aarti
Victory, victory, victory to mighty Hanuman
In whose body all happiness resides

All troubles are cut and destroyed
Whoever remembers mighty Hanuman

Victory, victory, victory to destroyer of evil
Victory, victory, victory to Lord Raghunatha

Victory, victory, victory to Bajrang Bali
Victory, victory, victory to Lord Hanuman
subsections.meaning: This aarti praises Lord Hanuman as the mighty protector who destroys evil and removes all obstacles from his devotees' lives.

sections.title: How to Perform the Aarti
sections.content: Proper method and rituals for performing Hanuman Aarti.

subsections.title: Preparation
subsections.content: Clean the worship area, arrange a thali with diya, sindoor, oil, and flowers. Place Hanuman idol or picture facing south.

subsections.title: Aarti Procedure
subsections.content: Apply sindoor tilak on Hanuman's idol, offer oil and sindoor, light the diya, and perform the aarti with devotion while chanting 'Jai Hanuman'.

sections.title: Spiritual Significance
sections.content: Understanding the deeper meaning and benefits of performing Hanuman Aarti.

subsections.title: Protection from Evil
subsections.content: The aarti invokes Hanuman's protection from negative energies, evil forces, and physical dangers.

subsections.title: Strength and Courage
subsections.content: Regular performance of this aarti helps develop physical strength, mental courage, and unwavering faith.
